hero.title: DYKESWHOTECH
hero.heading: EMPOWER DIVERSITY CONNECT WITH TALENTS DRIVE IMPACT
description: DykesWhoTech is a premier professional ecosystem of over 400 LGBTQ+ women in tech. We bridge the gap between top-tier talent and the industry's leading organizations. With dozens of successful high-impact projects, we are more than a community; we are a grassroots movement building real-world tools and fostering the next generation of tech leadership.

whyJoin.title: WHY JOIN OUR MISSION?
whyJoin.intro: Partnering with us translates into tangible growth for your organisation:

items.title: Access Elite Talent
items.text: Reach a highly skilled, niche audience of developers, product managers, and designers that are often missed by traditional recruiting.

items.title: Boost Brand Authority
items.text: Position your organization at the heart of the LGBTQ+ tech space through our flagship events.

items.title: Lead with DEI
items.text: Move beyond slogans. Act on your Diversity, Equity, and inclusion goals with a partner that delivers real representation and results.

engagementOpportunities.title: CHOOSE THE LEVEL OF ENGAGEMENT THAT BEST FITS YOUR ORGANIZATIONAL GOALS:
engagementOpportunities.subtitle: What in it for you? - In every partnership tier:

includedItems.title: Recruitment Boost
includedItems.text: Strategic placement of your open roles across our official website and community platforms.

includedItems.title: Direct Talent Access
includedItems.text: Unfiltered connection to our specialized professional talent pool.

includedItems.title: Brand Recognition
includedItems.text: Featured logo on our partner wall and in our monthly professional newsletter.

tiers.name: Professional Knowledge Exchange
tiers.value: We provide the expertise; you gain the engagement.

features.title: Expert-Led Workshop
features.text: We bring top industry leaders to host a technical or product-focused session for your team or our community.

features.title: Skill Sharing
features.text: Position your company as a place of professional growth and technical excellence.

tiers.name: LGBTQ+ Leadership Talk
tiers.value: Cultural transformation led by community experts.

features.title: Educational Keynote
features.text: A high-impact session for your organization on LGBTQ+ inclusion and building diverse tech teams.

features.title: DEI Roadmap
features.text: Gain practical insights on fostering a truly inclusive environment within your company.

tiers.name: The Full Experience "DykesWhoTech"
tiers.value: Turn your office into a community hub.

features.title: Signature Event
features.text: A high-energy corporate event produced by us, featuring a professional DJ from our community.

features.title: Atmosphere & Branding
features.text: Bring the unmistakable DykesWhoTech vibe to your company, creating lasting impressions with top talent.

customImpact.title: Custom Impact: Let's Build the Future Together
customImpact.subtitle: Looking for a tailored approach?
text: The options above are our most popular engagement routes, but we believe the best partnerships are bespoke. Whether you need high-volume recruitment, long-term brand positioning, or a unique community initiative, we will tailor a package to fit your specific vision and budget.
